title: link_option: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'getAttribute')
body: ### Describe the bug When I try to toggle anchors I get this error: ``` utils.js?v=cd9e9890:50 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'getAttribute') at link_option (:5173/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/client/utils.js?v=cd9e9890:50:11) at get_router_options (:5173/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/client/utils.js?v=cd9e9890:157:45) at HTMLDivElement. (:5173/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/client/client.js?v=cd9e9890:1466:21) ``` Happens on `1.0.0-next.570` Most likely related to https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/issues/7876 `` is the only affected element that I found. ### Reproduction ```svelte {#if visible} remove {:else} add {/if} ``` https://github.com/mc-0bit/sk-getAttribute ### Logs ```Shell utils.js?v=cd9e9890:50 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'getAttribute') at link_option (:5173/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/client/utils.js?v=cd9e9890:50:11) at get_router_options (:5173/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/client/utils.js?v=cd9e9890:157:45) at HTMLDivElement. (:5173/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/client/client.js?v=cd9e9890:1466:21) ``` ### System Info ```Shell System: OS: Linux 6.0 Arch Linux CPU: (16) x64 AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 8-Core Processor Memory: 21.92 GB / 31.29 GB Container: Yes Shell: 5.1.16 - /bin/bash Binaries: Node: 18.12.1 - ~/.nvm/versions/node/v18.12.1/bin/node Yarn: 1.22.19 - /usr/bin/yarn npm: 8.19.2 - ~/.nvm/versions/node/v18.12.1/bin/npm Browsers: Brave Browser: 107.1.45.133 Firefox: 107.0.1 npmPackages: @sveltejs/adapter-auto: next => 1.0.0-next.90 @sveltejs/kit: ^1.0.0-next.570 => 1.0.0-next.570 svelte: ^3.53.1 => 3.53.1 vite: ^3.2.4 => 3.2.4 ``` ### Severity blocking an upgrade ### Additional Information _No response_
